net.truelicense.v2.xml

Class V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.truelicense.core.TrueLicenseApplicationContext<V2RepositoryModel>
      • net.truelicense.v2.commons.V2LicenseApplicationContext
        • net.truelicense.v2.xml.V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryContextProvider<V2RepositoryModel>, CodecProvider, CompressionProvider, LicenseApplicationContext, LicenseFactory, LicenseManagementAuthorizationProvider, CachePeriodProvider, ClassLoaderProvider, Clock, PasswordPolicyProvider, PasswordProtectionProvider<ObfuscatedString>, BiosProvider

    public class V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext
extends V2LicenseApplicationContext
    The root context for the management of Version-2-with-XML (V2/XML) format license keys. Note that there is no compatibility between different format license keys.

    This class is immutable.

    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

    • Constructor Detail

      • V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext

        public V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext()

    • Method Detail

      • codec

        public Codec codec()
        Returns the codec.

        The implementation in the class V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext returns a JaxbCodec.

      • newJaxbContext

        protected JAXBContext newJaxbContext()
        Returns a new JAXB context for use with licenses and repositories. This method is normally only called once. In a multi-threaded environment, it may get called more than once, but then each invocation must return an object which behaves equivalent to any previously returned object.

        The implementation in the class V2XmlLicenseApplicationContext constructs a new JAXBContext for the root element classes License and V2RepositoryModel.
